page.title: Assurance of Salvation
page.verse: And this is the testimony: God gave us eternal life, and this life is in his Son. Whoever has the Son has life; whoever does not have the Son of God does not have life.

page.title: Assurance of Answered Prayer
page.verse: Until now you have not asked for anything in my name. Ask and you will receive, so that your joy may be complete.

page.title: Assurance of Victory
page.verse: No testing has overtaken you that is not common to everyone. God is faithful, and he will not let you be tested beyond your strength, but with the testing he will also provide the way out so that you may be able to endure it.

page.title: Assurance of Forgiveness
page.verse: If we confess our sins, he who is faithful and just will forgive us our sins and cleanse us from all unrighteousness.

page.title: Assurance of Guidance
page.verse: Trust in the Lord with all your heart, and do not rely on your own insight. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make straight your paths.

page.title: Christ the Center
page.verse: So if anyone is in Christ, there is a new creation: everything old has passed away; see, everything has become new.

page.title: God's Word
page.verse: All Scripture is breathed out by God and profitable for teaching, for reproof, for correction, and for training in righteousness.

page.title: Fellowship
page.verse: And let us consider how to provoke one another to love and good deeds, not neglecting to meet together, as is the habit of some, but encouraging one another, and all the more as you see the Day approaching.

page.title: Obedience to Christ
page.verse: I appeal to you therefore, brothers and sisters, by the mercies of God, to present your bodies as a living sacrifice, holy and acceptable to God, which is your spiritual worship.

page.title: Prayer
page.verse: If you abide in me, and my words abide in you, ask for whatever you wish, and it will be done for you.

page.title: Witnessing
page.verse: And he said to them, "Follow me, and I will make you fish for people."

page.title: All Have Sinned
page.verse: Since all have sinned and fall short of the glory of God.

page.title: Christ Paid the Penalty
page.verse: But God proves his love for us in that while we still were sinners Christ died for us.

page.title: Must Receive Christ
page.verse: But to all who received him, who believed in his name, he gave power to become children of God.

page.title: Sin's Penalty
page.verse: For the wages of sin is death, but the free gift of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord.

page.title: Salvation Not By Works
page.verse: For by grace you have been saved through faith, and this is not your own doing; it is the gift of Godâ€” not the result of works, so that no one may boast.

page.title: Assurance of Salvation
page.verse: I write these things to you who believe in the name of the Son of God, so that you may know that you have eternal life.
